questions.question: Considering the overall rectangular layout and textual information densely packed within a clearly defined border, what is the primary purpose indicated by the visual design of this product?

Based on the visual arrangement of the information, which nutritional component's value is emphasized with higher visual prominence and bolding?
What is the dominant color scheme of the text labels and numbers used to present the information on nutritional facts?
Observing the detailed breakdown of fats, what descriptive term indicates the absence of a particular type of fat?
Focusing on the carbohydrate section, what specific type of carbohydrate content has a significantly higher percentage compared to the total carbohydrate value?
What is the unit of measurement consistently used to quantify the values for fat, carbohydrates, and proteins throughout the provided information?
Based on the format of this visual product, what type of food product's nutritional information is presented?
In reference to the presented nutritional facts, what specific type of sugar is explicitly indicated as having a zero value?
What is the overall shape of the container that holds the information displayed?
Considering the type and organization of information in this visual product, what is the dominant textual format used to convey the data?
What unit is used for the measurement of Potassium in the displayed nutrition information?
What is the general layout style used to present the nutrition information, described by its arrangement and structure?
What is the textual element prominently displayed at the top, suggesting the content and nature of the following data?
What is the background color of the label on which the nutritional information is printed?
